"minissu kiyanne apima thama ban.ara kella.kellak eeka eekige loke.balapan eeki lassnata nidahase inna hati.me inne minissu ubayi mayi.mata awulak na..ubatath ee kellage tatu eka awulak na..ehema awulak nathi minihata.ube kellage tatu eka awul.ubalatamane kello set wenne modayo wage.."

mulika puhunuwa nima kala indurama bandawagath niladharin saha sewa prawesha niladharin wisithundeneku (23) adhikariyata path kere 2018 warshaye palamu indurama bandawa ganimata ayath niladharin dahathundeneku (13) saha 2018 palamu sewa prawesha bandawa ganimata ayath niladharin dahadeneku (10) nyayathmaka saha prayogika puhunuwa sarthakawa awasan kara ada (marthu 29) dina thrikunamalaya, nawika ha sagarika widyapitaye pradhana sarambaa pitiyedi wisira yana ladi.

obe daruwage daruwa charma pilika aasadithayek nowannata, apawithra jala bindak wenuwen handa nowatennata, kisida hiru eliya dakinu bari minis kulakayata ayath nowannata nam, noindul wanantharawala nopenena uulakin ipida piragena nil sayurata watena diya kanduruwalata da, nil pahayen bora pahayata haren maha sagarawalata da, diya wewi oba soya ena glasiyarawalata saha hima walasunta da, heta nil ahasa daknata nohaki yayi thawena us kandu mudunwalata da, dinen dina mihithalaya sadahatama harana satha sipa wargayanta da, apema kriyawan nisa miliyana gananin miyadena kuda daruwanta da obe aadaraya awashya yi.
me de nowuna kenekuth nathi tharam.
mona samajeka hadunath nisi magapenwimak denawa nam hari magata ganna puluwan.

diwayina pura pasal mattamin tikiri osu uyan tharagayak pawathwima, mahanuwara janadhipathi mandirayedi janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha wisin osu palayak situwima, wedagama nirikshana charikawaka nirathawima, dengu mardanaya wenuwen gewathu pirisidu kara osu pala situwima, kolambaa rajakiya widuhale osu uyana wiwrutha kirima, rajakiya widuhale waidya sayanayak pawathwima, rupawahini sanstha osu uyana wiwrutha kirima, madawachchiya hela weda gedara wiwrutha kirima, mihinthale hela weda gedara wiwrutha kirima, ambalangoda hela weda gedarata mulgala thabima, aayurweda aushadha sansthawe alewisalak ha paudgalika prathikara madhyasthanayak galla nagarayedi wiwrutha kirima, baththaramulla janakala kendraya thula aayurweda rupalawanya pilibandawa sammanthranayak pawathwima, ragama ranawiru sewanata aushadha ha upakarana parithyaga kirima ha hela weda gedarata mul gala thabima, homiyopathi uthsawayak pawathwima, neluwa pasale osu uyana aarambha kirima, thawalama pasale osu uyana aarambha kirima, uthuwankanda hela weda gedara wiwrutha kirima, ahaliyagoda hela weda gedara wiwrutha kirima, pattipola osu uyana ha sancharaka bangalawa wiwrutha kirima ha diwayina pura pasal mattamin waidya sayana pawathwima aadi wiwidha wadasatahan jathika aayurweda sathiya thula di kriyathmaka kirimata yojithawa atha.
aminennamayi enne anika athi rahakuth naha..

omayata puke aැrala pennanawa kiyala mu ekka chat karaddi apita loku eka dunne...eeta passe kiwwa omayata lamek hadala nalawanna denawa kiyala....iju iju kenji...ko me kenji balla....kage hari gu godak lewakanna gihillada ?
me kathawa apith ekka beda gaththata sthuthiyi hari...kalin kiyawala thibune na..
me wage lipi walin penne ape rate lingika asahane tharama thamayi...
awasanayedi sidu wanne obath pili no ganna deyak obage samaja jala pituwa bhawitha karamin oba wisin pathuruwa harimayi.
me sambandhayen jathyanthara krikat kawunsalayada anawaranaya kara athi athara owun ee sambandhayen me wanawitath parikshanayak aarambha kara athi bawa wartha wanawa.
ara abhitha kalin post eke kament waladi kiyapu dema matath una...

me dawaswala matath oya wadema una.
